attributes.action: further encourage the Football Associations of England, Scotland, Wales, Northern Ireland and the Republic of Ireland to host a Home Nations Football Tournament in the summer of 2008.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A tournament of this nature in the summer of 2008 will help towards brightening up what is otherwise going to be a very dull period for British and Irish football. It will also assist businesses likely to suffer as a result of non qualification and give the players an opportunity for competitive match experience in readiness for World Cup qualifying games which start in September 2008. I would suggest all five teams in a single league playing each other home and away giving fans 20 great games to watch.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
